OOC: you got to forgive Airly. Spanish is her first language, but I
think she manages to do pretty nicely on this rpg. I could go on for
hours on the subject, but I won't.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: What is it about this RPG and people not being able to spell 
> names right?
> 
> Empath::
> 
> Had it been anyone else but Windlord, Empath would have flown off and 
> ignored them.  As it is, she lands just behind Windlord, keeping an 
> eye out for other Predacons.  "You called?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord :
> > 
> > Windlord arrived where Rodimus were the had to plans and it was 
> time 
> > to applied one. "My love"thought Winlord while he was 
> > arriving "Come, I need you here, my dear love"
> > 
> > 
> > "Rodimus"said sofly Windlord "I know that you're willing to save 
> > her... I know that you wish see her back...."
> > 
> > Windlord walked slowly towards him and added "But listen me, my 
> > friend, If you go close to the base... Hydras will kill you, and 
> > when Nightlight comes back she will be broken hearted... You heard 
> > what said that scum... She will die if the program, virus... 
> > whatever is detecteds a not allowed reprogramation... That means 
> > that that scum knows how retire it... But we have to get her and 
> > capture him, for that you will need repair your wounds and we need 
> a 
> > plan... She will be watched for a while and would be imposible and 
> > suicide try to rescue her right now... Come my friend, you need 
> rest 
> > and heal your wounds"
> > 
> > OOC: Is he in robot mode?
